fields.name: Tab Overview
fields.description: Swipe down with three fingers on your trackpad to see an overview of all your tabs. Click on a thumbnail to select it. Works great in fullscreen mode.

fields.name: Check for known conflicts with 3rd party modules
fields.description: Enables a background check that warns you when a software incompatibility is detected (ie. 3rd party modules that crash the browser).

fields.name: CRX-less Web Apps
fields.description: Enables support for installing Chrome apps that are deployed using a manifest file on a webpage, rather than by packaging the manifest and icons into a crx file.

fields.name: Override software rendering list
fields.description: Overrides the built-in software rendering list and enables GPU-acceleration on unsupported system configurations.

fields.name: GPU compositing on all pages
fields.description: Uses GPU accelerated compositing on all pages, not just those that include GPU-accelerated layers.

fields.name: Threaded compositing
fields.description: Uses a secondary thread to perform web page compositing. This allows smooth scrolling, even when the main thread is unresponsive.

fields.name: Disable accelerated 2D canvas
fields.description: Disables the use of the GPU to perform 2d canvas rendering and instead uses software rendering.

fields.name: Disable deferred 2D canvas
fields.description: Disables the deferral of 2d canvas rendering, causing draw operations to be completed immediately, before running the next javascript command.

fields.name: Disable accelerated CSS animations
fields.description: When threaded compositing is enabled, accelerated CSS animations run on the compositing thread. However, there may be performance gains running with accelerated CSS animations, even without the compositor thread.

fields.name: Composited render layer borders
fields.description: Renders a border around composited Render Layers to help debug and study layer compositing.

fields.name: FPS counter
fields.description: Shows a page's actual frame rate, in frames per second, when hardware acceleration is active.

fields.name: GPU Accelerated SVG Filters
fields.description: Use the GPU to accelerate rendering of SVG filters.

fields.name: Disable GPU VSync
fields.description: Disables synchronization with the display's vertical refresh rate when GPU rendering. This allows frame rates to exceed 60 hertz. While useful for benchmarking purposes, this also results in visual tearing during rapid screen updates.

fields.name: Disable WebGL
fields.description: Enabling this option prevents web applications from accessing the WebGL API.

fields.name: Fixed position elements create stacking contexts
fields.description: Enabling this option makes all fixed position elements create new CSS stacking contexts.

fields.name: Native Client
fields.description: Enable Native Client for all web applications, even those that were not installed from the Chrome Web Store.

fields.name: Native Client hardware exception handling
fields.description: Enable support for Native Client hardware exception handling.

fields.name: Native Client GDB-based debugging
fields.description: Enable GDB debug stub. This will stop a Native Client application on startup and wait for nacl-gdb (from the NaCl SDK) to attach to it.

fields.name: Restrict Native Client GDB-based debugging by pattern
fields.description: Restricts Native Client application GDB-based debugging by URL of manifest file. Native Client GDB-based debugging must be enabled for this option to work.

fields.name: Portable Native Client
fields.description: Enable support for Portable Native Client.

fields.name: Native Client IPC proxy
fields.description: Use Chrome IPC, rather than NaCl SRPC, to proxy Pepper calls between Chrome and the plugin.

fields.name: Speech JavaScript API
fields.description: Enable support for speech recognition using the Speech JavaScript API.

fields.name: Experimental Extension APIs
fields.description: Enables experimental extension APIs. Note that the extension gallery doesn't allow you to upload extensions that use experimental APIs.

fields.name: Action box
fields.description: Enable or disable the "Action Box" experimental toolbar UI.

fields.name: Script badges
fields.description: Shows extension "script badges" in the location bar rather than page actions.

fields.name: Script buddle
fields.description: Enable or disable the "Script Bubble" experimental toolbar UI.

fields.name: New apps install bubble
fields.description: When installing an app, always show a bubble pointing at the new tab page button on the tabstrip instead of opening a new tab page.

fields.name: Disable hyperlink auditing
fields.description: Disable sending hyperlink auditing pings.

fields.name: Experimental location features
fields.description: Enables experimental extensions to the geolocation feature to use operating system location APIs (where available).

fields.name: Add grouping to tab context menu
fields.description: Adds items to the tab context menu for grouping tabs.

fields.name: Experimental static IP configuration
fields.description: Enables static IP configuration. May not work.

fields.name: Show Autofill predictions
fields.description: Annotates web forms with Autofill field type predictions as placeholder text.

fields.name: Enable tab favicon sync
fields.description: Enable syncing the favicons of open tabs as part of Open Tab sync.

fields.name: Disable syncing app notifications
fields.description: Disable app notifications in the sync settings. This turns off syncing notifications received from your apps to other clients.

fields.name: Gesture tap highlighting
fields.description: Enable the experimental gesture tap highlight implementation.

fields.name: Smooth scrolling
fields.description: Enable the experimental smooth scrolling implementation.

fields.name: Use new scoring in HistoryQuickProvider
fields.description: In omnibox autocomplete, use the new scoring function for ranking matches coming from HistoryQuickProvider.

fields.name: Reorder results for inlining in HistoryQuickProvider
fields.description: In omnibox autocomplete, reorder suggestions in HistoryQuickProvider to make an inlineable one appear first.

fields.name: Inline HistoryQuickProvider suggestions
fields.description: In omnibox autocomplete, allow inlining of matches coming from the HistoryQuickProvider.

fields.name: Enable Panels
fields.description: Enable Panel windows that open outside of the browser frame. Attempts to open a Panel will open a popup instead if not enabled. Panels are always enabled on the dev and canary channels.

fields.name: Save page as MHTML
fields.description: Disables saving pages as HTML-only or HTML Complete; enables saving pages only as MHTML: a single text file containing HTML and all sub-resources.

fields.name: Enable auto-login
fields.description: When enabled, visiting a Google account login page will trigger an infobar allowing easy sign in with the Google account connected to the profile. Auto-login is always disabled if the profile is not connected to an account, regardless of this flag.

fields.name: HTTP pipelining
fields.description: Enable experimental pipelining of HTTP requests.

fields.name: Enable SPDY/3
fields.description: Enable experimental SPDY/3.

fields.name: Built-in asynchronous DNS
fields.description: Enable experimental asynchronous DNS client.

fields.name: Disable Media Source API on <video> elements
fields.description: Disable experimental Media Source API on the video elements. This API allows JavaScript to send media data directly to a video element.

fields.name: Enable Encrypted Media Extensions on <video> elements
fields.description: Enable experimental Encrypted Media Extensions on the video elements.

fields.name: Per-tile painting
fields.description: Enable per-tile painting of page contents when compositing is enabled.

fields.name: Enable experimental JavaScript
fields.description: Enable web pages to use experimental JavaScript features.

fields.name: Enable tab browser dragging
fields.description: Enable creating a browser window when dragging tabs.

fields.name: Disable Better session restore
fields.description: Disables the Better session restore features which restore more session state (e.g., session cookies) after restarts and crashes.

fields.name: Disable 3D software rasterizer
fields.description: Don't fall back to a 3D software rasterizer when the GPU cannot be used.

fields.name: Enable experimental WebKit features
fields.description: Enable experimental WebKit features that are in development.

fields.name: Enable CSS shaders
fields.description: Enable filter effects on DOM elements using custom GLSL shaders. More info at https://dvcs.w3.org/hg/FXTF/raw-file/tip/filters/index.html#feCustomElement

fields.name: Enable extension activity UI
fields.description: Enable experimental UI that shows a log of extension activity.

fields.name: Disable NTP "other devices" menu
fields.description: Disable the new tab page menu for accessing tabs on other devices.

fields.name: Enable Developer Tools experiments
fields.description: Enable Developer Tools experiments. Use Settings panel in Developer Tools to toggle individual experiments.

fields.name: NTP Suggestions page
fields.description: Add 'Suggestions' card to the new tab page, which suggests the pages to be opened.

fields.name: Force synchronous spellchecking
fields.description: Force use of synchronous spellchecking. Enabling this flag will prevent Chrome from using a web service to get spellchecking results.

fields.name: Touch optimized UI
fields.description: Enables experimental layout refinements to improve user experience with touch screens.

fields.name: Enable webpage text sub-pixel positioning
fields.description: Allows text glyphs on web pages to have X positions which aren't snapped to the pixel grid.

fields.name: Force enable touch events
fields.description: Enables experimental touch event support regardless of the presence of a physical touch screen capable of generating touch events.

fields.name: Enable tab capture API
fields.description: Enables experimental tab capture API to generate video streams of tab content.

fields.name: NaCl Socket API
fields.description: Allows applications to use NaCl Socket API. Use only to test NaCl plugins.

fields.name: Stacked tabs
fields.description: Tabs never shrink, instead they stack on top of each other when there is not enough space.

fields.name: Force high DPI mode
fields.description: Overrides the device display density to force the use of high DPI mode and assets.

fields.name: Enable GAIA web-based sign in
fields.description: When enabled, will use a GAIA web-based sign in flow to connect a profile to a Google account. Otherwise ClientLogin is used. The web-based flow permits using verification codes instead of ASPs during authentication.

fields.name: Enable Views textfield
fields.description: Enables an experimental textfield for application UI; does not affect web content.

fields.name: Disable new checkbox style
fields.description: Disables new appearance and sizing behavior for checkboxes and radio buttons.

fields.name: Enable experimental frameless dialogs
fields.description: Enables an experimental frame treatment on certain dialogs.

fields.name: Disable hardware-accelerated video decode
fields.description: Disables hardware-accelerated video decode where available.

fields.name: Disable the Website Settings UI
fields.description: Disables the Website Settings UI that replaces the page info bubble and provides an easy way to configure site-specific settings.

fields.name: Web Audio input
fields.description: Enables live audio input using getUserMedia() and the Web Audio API.

fields.name: Enable contacts integration
fields.description: Enables downloading Google contacts and displaying them in the App List.

fields.name: Enable debugging for packed apps
fields.description: Enables debugging context menu options such as Inspect Element for packed applications.

fields.name: Enable password generation
fields.description: Allow the user to have Chrome generate passwords when it detects account creation pages.

fields.name: Enable crashing on GPU hang
fields.description: Crash the GPU process whenever Chrome detects that it has hung.

fields.name: Enable deferred image decoding
fields.description: Defer image decoding operations in WebKit until painting.

fields.name: Enable performance monitoring
fields.description: Enable passive gathering of performance-related metrics and events and provide the option to view this data in a graphical fashion.

fields.name: Enable new Autofill heuristics
fields.description: Enable new Autofill heuristics. This primarily covers detection of additional field types, such as credit card type.

fields.name: Enable Web Intents invocation for web content
fields.description: Make it possible for any web page to invoke web intents.

fields.name: Enable WebGL
fields.description: Enabling this option allows web applications to access the WebGL API.

fields.name: Enable full history sync
fields.description: If tab sync is enabled, this feature allows you to see and delete history entries from your synced devices at chrome://history.

fields.name: Enable sync keystore encryption
fields.description: Switch to sync's new server supported encryption schema. Warning: this will modify your sync data, possibly making it unreadable to other clients.
